ConnectionStrings._comment1: NOTE: Must specify SQL Server 2012 rather than SQL Server 2008 for the Type System Version attribute (see issue #72)
ConnectionStrings._comment2: NOTE: TrustServerCertificate=True required after updating from System.Data.Sql to Microsoft.Data.Sql as Encrypt is now set to true by default; see: https://stackoverflow.com/a/17658821/3628232
ConnectionStrings.MsSql2008: Server=(local)\MSSQLSERVER2008;Initial Catalog=nhsp_test;User ID=nhsp_test;Password=nhsp_test;Type System Version=SQL Server 2012;TrustServerCertificate=True
